Хорошая игра с интересно поданным сюжетом, неплохими головоломками от которых трудно устать. Хорошо проработанные персонажи, выдающие остроумные шутки, порой глумящиеся над игроком, говоря, какой он тупой :) И это только singleplayer. Multiplayer довольно неплох, но долго в него играть не хочется. Играется весело, особенно, когда слышишь реакцию своего напарника по испытаниям после очередного скидывания его в кислоту/пропасть, убивая его лазером или выкидывая перед турелями.
Лучший симулятор разрушения и построения отношений ever.

This is a very good game. It has an interesting story, good and indefinitely usable mechanics, and runs good on my trash computer (my computer has a Intel HD 2000 Graphics processor with no GPU that i know of and was made in 2011 compared to one with a Intel HD 4400 Graphics processor made in 2019 that has a very big GPU). Oh, and co-op and workshop test chambers. That means YOU can make test chambers and play them with your friends. But not only that, you can share them with the world too!

무슨게임인지볼라고 유튜브나 스트리머영상을보면 

'와 이거 엄청어렵겠는데?' 

'머리가 좋아야만 가능하겠는데?' 라고생각하지만

막상 해보면 그리어렵지않습니다. 

적당한 두뇌회전과 차근차근 접근을하다보면

어렵지않게 클리어 할 수 있습니다.

또한 지금봐도 나쁘지않은 그래픽과 뛰어난 게임성으로 

꼭 강추를 드리는 갓겜입니다.

Excellent story, innovative levels, advanced physics, and just pure fun. The game has a very rich story that keeps you locked into the game, the levels in-game are very complex and complicated, the game utilizes real world physics and the game is just a very fun and excellent puzzle solver.
Genial juego de puzzles, me encanta ^^

Very creative puzzle game with Chapters that feel like they're Legend of Zelda temples. Alot of fun and challenging ways to tackle these puzzles besides just shooting out portals. I played it Co-Op with my friend and we had a blast figuring out things. Very rewarding, thinking through multiple steps and putting a plan in action together that works out (or doesn't) flawlessly. 5-10 hours of fun and a must play for everyone. 8/10 - Very Good
Amazing game, puzzles were fun and each one was unique ! And there is enough custom maps to last you a life time !!! one of the greatest games ever made.

This is a great game with an awesome storyline, lots of puzzles, and even more puzzles made by the community. I got Portal 2 on sale, and I'd say it was worth it. The puzzlemaking community has gotten less active lately, but the sheer amount of currently existing puzzles are practically infinite.
Great co-op game to play with friends!

You need to play Portal before you play this one. This is a great game! I highly recommend it. It runs on most PCs, so it probably won't be a difficult game to run.

It's Portal 2, a quintessential game for any PC gamer. It runs well, plays well, has one of the BEST Co-Op campaigns of all time and is just fun. This game is just fun.

Usually goes for cheap in sales, you are doing yourself a disservice if this is not in your steam library.

Juego muy entretenido, uno de mis favoritos de juegos de puzzle. Una interesante historia que continua luego del primer juego asi que es recomendable que compren el portal 1 para conocer su historia, aun que es algo simple.
Es entretenido para las personas que les guste resolver puzzles, y hasta tiene un modo cooperativo con historia y otros con mapas echos por la comunidad.
Lo recomiendo completamente.
It is a really fun game and continues to be fun.
